definition: (of a wife) wise and kind/perfect in her traditional roles
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation

sentences.english: The first-rate wife is virtuous and keeps a neat home.
sentences.chinese: 一等太太，治家整潔，賢慧有德。

sentences.english: Mrs. Wang is a good wife.
Her virtuousness would be reflected by her support to me.
sentences.chinese: 她的賢慧就是對我的支持。

sentences.english: A prudent wife is from the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 賢慧的妻是耶和華所賜的。

sentences.english: I had a virtuous wife, but I wasn't appreciative.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個賢慧的妻子，但我覺得一無所有。

definition: variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
a good wife and loving mother
to take care of one's family
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to admire talented people/to value talent
to give one's heart to/to devote one's life to
to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
